subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Four accomplished cyclists who were once teammates of Lance Armstrong, who faces new doping charges, have asked that they not be considered for the 2012 Olympic team.
snippet: Four accomplished cyclists who were once teammates of Lance Armstrong, who faces new doping charges, have asked that they not be considered for the 2012 Olympic team.
